entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:16 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 08:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
